data.text: @FanciahCockTail Hi there, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. We do our best to avoid cancellations but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@ABRDF Hi there, I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble adding extra legroom seats to your flight. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Would you mind sending us a DM here to speak with someone from the team? Thanks - Norine

@TaraHamid3 Hi Tara, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@beckaroo81 Hi @beckaroo81, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@dr_s_clarke Hi Stephen, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled and I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM so we can look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi
@TheDanielKoenig Hey Edgar, it's good to know that Pas and Mareesa were able to help out! If you could DM us with your booking details, we'd love to pass your feedback on to the team. Thanks - Leslie
@clarenceb30 Hi Claire, sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. Would you mind sending us a DM - we may be able to provide more details about your flight. Thanks - Jeff

@gajames2 Hi Greg, I understand how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you be able to send us a DM with your booking details? we’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Leslie

@Allycat217 Hi Alexandra, sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@strathy2014 Hi @strathy2014, I'm sorry to hear this happened. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Please send us a DM with more info if you would like to chat with someone about this further. Thanks - Jeff

@HarrietGeorgin2 Hi Harriet, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Should you need to discuss a specific booking or require any assistance, feel free to send us a DM. Thanks – Vi
@grillp Hi Gil, sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. Would you be able to send us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi

@Tweety_202 Hi @Tweety_202, sorry to hear that your son's flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require further assistance please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy

@t_mack14 Hi Taylor, having a cancelled flight is never a good feeling. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. However, sometimes things are out of our hands. Feel free to send us a DM if you need any assistance with your flight. Thanks - Norine

@ShannonMackay26 Hi Shannon-lee, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Would you be able to send us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi

@hannahhbanaanaa Hi Hannah, sorry to hear this. We do our best to avoid delays - but sometimes it's unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Mauri
@tradrmum Hi @tradrmum. Sorry for the confusion, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us with more info? Thanks - Dan
@mattastolfi Hi Matt, we really appreciate your suggestion and we'll be sure to pass it onto the team for you. - Paul

@MatthewGibbo Hey Matthew, thanks for reaching out. There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on. Thanks - Dan
@iamnottheword Hi Sara, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info about your voucher? We'd like to confirm this for you. Thanks - Jeff

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @bkaussie Hi Blythe, I understand how inconvenient it is to have a missing item. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Dan
@HarryScholes91 Hi Harry, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. Would you be able to send us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi

@paras_chawala Hi Paras, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@GuidoStracke Hi Guido, sorry to hear about this. That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like you. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. Thanks - Vi

@AMDziedzic Hi Anna, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was delayed and about your baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff
@RBu29 Hi Bucks, sorry for the confusion about your flight schedule. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking info? We'd appreciate the chance to check this further for you. Thanks - Jaya

@jodee31 Hi Jody, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy
@fullontennis Hi there, sorry to hear about your delayed flight. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya

@kaffando Hi there, sorry to hear about your delayed flight - we do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. Alternatively, you can send us a DM if you need further assistance with your booking. Thanks - Jaya

@snruub Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Alternatively, you can check the status of a flight on our website - https://t.co/66MGhbQ8mz. Thanks - Leslie

@juan_jflorez Hi Juan, sorry to hear that you're having trouble with changing your flight online. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@abparmaa Hi Ashish, we’re sorry for the inconvenience this caused. Our systems underwent a necessary scheduled upgrade overnight to improve our reservation systems, which is now complete. If you require further assistance, feel free to send us a DM so we can assist. Thanks- Jen
@Roozbehho 2/2 If you want me to look into your experience with our staff further, just send us a DM with more info. Thanks - Dan

@Roozbehho 1/2 Hi Ross. I appreciate your frustration, missing a flight is never a good feeling, however because of traffic with other flights at the airport, we do have to close check-in and boarding at the exact time we’re instructed to.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: @imfallfromgrace Hi there, I'm sorry to hear this. We know how upsetting it is when travel plans change and we do our best to avoid cancellations. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need any further assistance with your flight, we’d be happy to assist. Thanks - Norine

@michelle_iso Hi Michelle, we’re really sorry to hear about your experience and appreciate this has been a very frustrating situation for you. Could you please send us a DM so we can see how can we assist further? Thanks - Jen

@formed1992 Hi @formed1992, sorry for any inconvenience caused by this. Our system is back up and running now. You may try to clear the cache and browser history then try again. Alternatively, feel free to DM us if you need further assistance. Thanks - Vi

@Cameron90661148 Hi Cameron, I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused by the maintenance. The maintenance is now complete, you can now manage your booking via our website, or check-in. Alternatively, you may also send us a DM with your booking reference for us to assist you further. Thanks - Jeff
@imarminder Hi Arminder, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff

@holytrinity1968 Hi Gary, sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. We know how upsetting it is to have cancelled flights and changes in your travel plans. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@JRank12345 Hi Josh, sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. Can you provide your full name as it appears on your booking to look into this further? Thanks – Mauri

@_dvwrites Hi @_dvwrites, sorry to hear that your original flight was cancelled. I understand your worry about the status of your next flight and we'll be happy to check this for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@ragavi41039224 Hi Ragavi, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Jeff

@urbancreature Hi Aaron, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks – Vi

@michelle_iso Hi Michelle, I understand how stressful this is for you and I'm sorry to hear that your call was disconnected. The scheduled maintenance is now complete, so you can now manage your booking via our website. We’re sorry for the inconvenience this caused. Thanks - Norine

@matthewbailes Hi Matthew, sorry to hear this. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@ConkyOCE Hi Mitch, we’re sorry to hear about your cancelled flight - we know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya

@thegreatgary123 Hi Gary, sorry to hear that your flight was impacted by multiple disruptions and about your lost baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff
@misterdume That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Michael. Our airport teams are looking into what happened here. Thanks – Mauri
@ClintCrisafi Hi Clint, we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a PM with more info? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff
@AmyGibbons4 Hi @AmyGibbons4, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@iPilko Hi Ian, that’s not the standard we set for our aircraft. Thanks for bringing your experience to our attention. We take feedback like this seriously and will pass your comments on to the team. - Jen
@Adam86Valentine You can check your flight status here https://t.co/9Dv79LcXp0. Alternatively, you may DM us so we can help you check your flight status. Thanks - Jay 2/2

@Adam86Valentine Hi Adam, I understand your concern about your upcoming flight. If we need to make changes to your flight times, we will let you know as soon as possible to give you enough time to review your travel plans. 1/2

@shubhamtweet Hi @shubhamtweet, sorry to hear that you're having trouble with checking in online. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff
@deiseguy 1/2 You can check your flight status here https://t.co/9Dv79LcXp0. Alternatively, you may DM us so we can help you check your flight status. Thanks - Jen

@deiseguy 1/1 Hi Brian, I understand your concern about your upcoming flight. If we need to make changes to your flight times, we will let you know as soon as possible to give you enough time to review your travel plans.

@Lunchy_ Hi Xavier, sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@kellhalidone Hi Pascall, sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy
@Scouse4ever4 Hi there, I understand how inconvenient cancelled flights can be. We'd like to look into this further - could you please send us a DM here with more info? Thanks - Norine

@uphighdownlow7 Hi @uphighdownlow7, sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@DaraGar71649378 Thanks for letting us know, Dara. We’re sorry to see this happened. We’ve passed this onto the cleaners, so hopefully you see less mess next time you fly with us! Thanks - Vi

@Justuporn Hi Justin, we’re sorry to hear this happened. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Could you please send us a DM so we look into this for you? Thanks – Leslie

@pontoclara @pontoclara Hi there, sorry to hear this. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM with more info so we can assist. Thanks – Paul
@AmandaJessica09 Hi Amanda, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? I'd be happy to check this for you. Thanks - Jeff
@DJRJ_AU Hi Douglas, we'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Could you send us a DM with more info so we can assist? Thanks - Paul

@RedheadEdition @RedheadEdition Hi there, that doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jay

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @AmandaJessica09 Hi Amanda, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Jeff

@BradleighBetts Hi Bradleigh, I understand that you want to know the reason for the cancellation. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? I'd be happy to check this for you. Thanks - Jeff
@huytra110 Hi Huy, sorry for to hear that your flight was delayed. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

@lests1 Hi @lests1, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need to discuss this further, you may send us a DM with more info. Thanks - Jeff

@robbie_buck Hi Robbie, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change - we never like having to cancel a flight, however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Could you please send us a DM so we can see how can we assist further? Thanks - Jen

@BradleighBetts Hi Bradleigh, We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible, If we need to make changes to your flight we try to let you know as soon as possible to give you enough time to review your travel plans. Thanks - Dan

@andrewsomewhere Hi Andrew. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

@Margie43690105 2/2  We’d like to get you on your way as soon as possible – please send us a DM if you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s, or would like to explore alternative options. Thanks - Jaya
@Margie43690105 1/2 Hi Margie, we’re sorry to hear about your experience and the impact this has had on you during a difficult time for your family.

@OGadhra Thanks for reaching out. Jetstar’s marketing of the route refers to Uluru however as the airport itself is called ‘Ayers Rock Airport’ (IATA Airport Code AYQ) this is also included. We appreciate your feedback. Thanks – Jen

@John_JackDiego Hi Jack, sorry to hear that your sister's flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks – Vi

@Doooooooom4 Hi @Doooooooom4, sorry to hear about your brother's flight - we do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. If you require assistance with rebooking the flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. - Jaya

@proseccobubbly Hi Prosecco, I’m sorry to hear this and understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks –  Dan
